column2:
active %>%
  flextable() %>%
  align(align = "center", part = "all") %>%
  width(j = 12, width = 1.3) %>%
  width(j = 2, width = 2.2) %>%
  width(j = c(1,4,8:11), width = .7) %>%
  colformat_double(j = c(3,5:9), digits = 0) %>%
  colformat_double(j = 3,
    big.mark = "", digits = 0, na_str = "N/A")
